Corrigendum-I to Addendum to AVSEC Order No. 6/2018

Subject: Aerodrome Security Programme.

In exercise of powers conferred under rules 10,11,13 and rule 62 of the
Aircraft (Security) Rules, 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation
Security, for the purpose of the safety of passengers, crew, ground personnel and
the general public in all matters relating to safeguarding against act of unlawful
interference with civil aviation, directs for partial modification in this Bureau
‘Addendum to AvSec Order No. 6/2018 dated 28.3.2024 issued on the subject.

2. The existing Para 4.59.1 shall be read as 4.59.1 (a) in-situ and further, Para
4.59.1 (b) is hereby inserted below 4.59.1 (a) in the template of Aerodrome
Security Programme circulated vide addendum to AvSec Order No. 6/2018 dated
28.3.2024, which reads as under:

Para 4.59.1 (b) “Each aerodrome operator shall provide appropriate
infrastructure/ facilities, as applicable, so as to protect the aircraft from
unlawful interference from the commencement of aircraft search/check till
departure of the aircraft”

3. All other provisions of Addendum to BCAS AvSec Order No. 6/2018 dated
28.3.2024 shall remain unchanged. The above amendment shall be implemented

with immediate effect.
de Wet, IPS

Director General
